programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Egypt: Survivors in the Sands
programme.desc: Life in the decimate deserts of Egypt, seems impossible. However, beneath the surface Egypt is very much alive. Animals rule the land, skies, and surrounding seas and thrive in the amazing climate.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Iceland: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Iceland is a land born out of fire, sculpted by ice. This unique island is home to some of the planet's rarest and most spectacular creatures and it harbors some of the most extreme environments on Earth.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart
programme.desc: Every year the Pantanal is drowned by immense floods, and then suffer severe drought. Yet, while people struggle, the Pantanal hosts some of the greatest gatherings of animals on the planet.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as mega-diverse. Malaysia's animals and plants have exploited every opportunity to carve out an existence and so have adapted to some very strange ways of life.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: The Final Cut

programme.title: In Time

programme.title: The Last Legion

programme.title: Bride of the Monster

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: In the season finale, Ian tries to bring it all together.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client break all the rules and build the ultimate boat-inspired, open-aired cruiser. (Part 1)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client continue the ultimate open-aired cruiser build and debut it a top West Coast car show. (Part 2)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian gets a call from a top Hollywood picture car coordinator and works his magic to get a vintage race car back in action.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian is commissioned to help build a wild, massive mobile floating party island for a prestigious festival in the Nevada desert (Burning Man).

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidson’s, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Abyss kills Beka's friend, and the crew must figure out what information they killed for.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues a ship returning from peace talks with the Magog.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog attack has dire consequences. The Andromeda is destroyed, Trance and Dylan are presumed the only survivors and Dylan escapes into the route of ages.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan ends up on Seefra, where the superstitious population has no technology.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka is dumped on Seefra after the Andromeda is stolen, and Dylan must prove the ship is his.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of Aces
programme.desc: Garth Doull trained to be a policeman but the lure of the race track saw him swap sides of the law to become a consummate con-man. On the 8th of September 1989, his body was found floating in Wellington harbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: For Better or Worse
programme.desc: Moira’s decision to take a shortcut leads to a dangerous petrol spill on Drovers Run. His marriage on shaky ground, Alex’s world is turned upside down when he and Stevie nearly kiss.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Eleventh Hour
programme.desc: As Stevie ties up loose ends on her last day at Drovers Run before trial, she’s saved at the final hour by a desperate confession. Eager to integrate herself into the community to save her marriage, Fiona joins the CFS.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Old Wrongs
programme.desc: Jodi receives ghostly help from the past on Gungellan’s 150th anniversary celebration. Rose arrives to do work experience – but it’s not the joyful reunion that Stevie has imagined.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Handle With Care
programme.desc: Rose falls for a seemingly reformed Leo. Riley reveals the truth of his army days to Jodi on an overnight muster. Regan proposes to Dave with devastating results.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Guess Who's Coming To Dinner
programme.desc: Leo’s dastardly plan is revealed when Rose runs away with him. Kate’s hopes to win the Young Farmer of the Year Award are dashed when she realises that Jodi is entering too.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Voices of Pain
programme.desc: On this episode TAPS heads back to the fan favorite; Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, Kentucky, an abandoned tuberculosis hospital haunted by its former patients and staff.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Garden State Asylum
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels to New Jersey to investigate the infamous Essex County Hospital.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Club Dead
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels south to Ybor City, Florida to the historic Cuban Club.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Naples, New York, to investigate the Naples Hotel.This hotel was built in 1895.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cold War
programme.desc: In Kansas, tensions run high when Andre muscles in on Sam’s big build. And back at the log yard, winter gales put a chill on Peter’s enormous project for a Russian client.

programme.title: Timber Kings: A Big Deal
programme.desc: Joel pulls out all the stops, hoping his contract for four cabins in Michigan will land Pioneer an order for sixteen more. Meantime, Andre’s simple kitchen reno turns into a bigger deal than expected.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Pig in Mud
programme.desc: In the Prairies, Peter gets stuck in the mud, trying to make a client’s dreams come true. Meantime, Beat helps Sam with his biggest build ever, but a reckless rookie crane op threatens to bring the whole project down.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Sofia Central Prison, Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: With a crumbling foundation fit for demolition, Sofia Central prison is inhospitable for anyone, including criminals. With multiple prisoner cells, bunks stacked 3 high and horrid isolation cells, prisoners live idly behind bars for 23 hours a day.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Miami, Dade County Jail Boot Camp, Miami, Florida, USA
programme.desc: The toughest divisions of the Miami Dade: Boot Camp gives minor offenders a chance to escape the prison through unforgiving drills and rules. To many it is a better alternative to The M-D County Jail where murderers and rapists have their own rules.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: South Cotabato Jail is one of the most overcrowded prisons in the world. There is no hope of improvement.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: Lynn calls Joan, Maya, and William old after realizing they never go out anymore. They decide to prove Lynn wrong by joining her for a night on the town at a hot new club.

programme.title: Girlfriends: R-E-S-P-E-C-T, Find Out What It Means to William
programme.desc: When William begins to feel that he is not respected at work he considers leaving the firm, and Monica freaks out thinking that he won’t be able to support her and their new baby.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Deck the Halls With Bags and Folly
programme.desc: Joan joins a support group for people who have relatives serving in Iraq but is upset when she finds out they are not planning a holiday party due to financial restraints.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Adapt to Adopt
programme.desc: Maya and Darnell romanticize the idea of adopting until they attend a neighborhood group for people who have adopted children and are offered a baby girl to adopt.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Stand and Deliver
programme.desc: Joan goes to the school where Aaron used to teach in order to read a letter he sent to his former students. However, when Joan arrives, the students give her a hard time so Maya decides to use her street smarts to help Joan get through to the students.

programme.title: Girlfriends: What's Black-A-Lackin'?
programme.desc: Lynn gets upset when she learns that her record label is pushing back the release of her album to promote another artist, Chrisette Michele.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Toe Sucking
programme.desc: Four girlfriends: picky lawyer Joan, gold-digging real estate agent Toni, professional student Lynn, and Joan's headstrong assistant Maya get involved with each other's loves and lives, particularly after Toni starts dating Joan's ex.

programme.title: Girlfriends: One Night Stand
programme.desc: Joan, who hasn't had sex in a year, decides to have a one-night stand with handsome restaurateur Davis.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hip-Ocracy
programme.desc: Joan, Toni, and Lynn decide to find dates on the Internet. When Joan meets Marcus she thinks he is too good to be true until she finds out he wears a girdle. Toni breaks it off with her date simply because he's too black.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Sister Circle
programme.desc: Sabrina tries to navigate the waters of friendship despite some clashing personalities. Andi's greatest secret is revealed. (S1, ep11)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Glove
programme.desc: When a terrifying haunting threatens to break a Daisytown, PA couple apart, PRS is their last resort. As the investigation deepens, PRS and the family learn that it's just the tip of iceberg, turns out this haunting might be all in the family.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Deer Friend/Buster Hits the Books
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: Arthur: Just Desserts/The Big Dig
programme.desc: Arthur has a hard time resisting sweets, and one evening his overindulgence wins him an upset stomach and some 'Grimm' dreams. Arthur and D.W. loved it when Grandpa Dave came to visit--but now he only wants to sleep and play checkers.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Blankie/Arthur's Substitute Teacher Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. has one little secret--her blankie. When it mysteriously disappears, Arthur is pressed into service. Find that blankie--or else! Next, the unbelievable has happened--Mr. Ratburn has gotten sick. And who's going to be the substitute?

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: Arthur: Fernkenstein's Monster/D.W., Dancing Queen
programme.desc: Inspired by Mary Shelley's "Frankenstein," Fern tells a tale so scary that Arthur and the gang become afraid of her! Then, Binky decides to teach D.W. to dance, but she just doesn't seem to get the moves. Is D.W. a no-talent klutz?

programme.title: Arthur: Brain's Brain/Brain Sees Stars
programme.desc: Brain's Easter egg hunts are notoriously hard. But this year's might prove impossible if Brain can't remember where he hid the final egg. Then, crazy coincidences have prevented Brain from seeing a meteor shower in person.

programme.title: NEW: The Siege of Malta
programme.desc: At last here is the definitive story of heroism and hardship of a people uniquely and collectively awarded the George Cross 'for gallantry', and told by some of the heroic survivors.

programme.title: VE Day - Forever in their Debt
programme.desc: Tells the stories of those who experienced the end of the war in all its many forms. It features a wide range of interviews from children who remember the street parties, to the servicemen who remember not having to buy a single drink that day.

programme.title: Voices of D-Day Landings
programme.desc: In the early hours of June 6th, 1944 Allied forces began the greatest military assault ever attempted. They came to Normandy by both air and sea with one objective.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After being Catfished by her best friend, Larissa turned to online pal Anthony for support. Feelings between them grew, but after some suspicious moves, Larissa is worried he is also lying. (S5, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lauren & Derek
programme.desc: Lauren met Derek online years ago. Derek is caring, supporting Lauren after she had a baby with a former boyfriend. Lauren thinks Derek could be the one, so why has he avoided meeting her?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Leanne & Jamie
programme.desc: Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. After cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Since Leuh saw surfer Justin it's been insta-love. But after two failed attempts to meet up, she wants to know if he's the man of her dreams or is she one in a long line of online lovers. (S5, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Former model Jayme has learned that her online boyfriend is not only fake, but appears to be catfishing other women too! Nev and Max help find the catfish to put an end to his deception. (S5, ep13)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The Hills: Out With The Old
programme.desc: After a rocky summer with her boyfriend Jason, Lauren decides to break it off and returns to work to face her boss. Heidi finds herself in trouble with a guy both she and Audrina are dating. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Shore Shower
programme.desc: MVP is back, resulting in a near threesome for Vinny. The girls struggle to keep the baby shower a surprise for Nicole, and Vinny is nervous about Jionni seeing him at the party. (S6, ep10)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Dirty Little Secrets
programme.desc: In April 2006, Matt Baker, a pastor from Waco, Texas, returned home to find his wife Kari unconscious, with an empty bottle of Unisom and a suicide note beside her. Police ruled it a suicide. However, her family believed otherwise.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ghosts of Mississippi
programme.desc: A report on a string of unsolved homicides in Columbus, Mississippi. Five elderly residents, all living within a mile of each other, were killed within 18 months. Police say, a terrified community believes a serial killer is on the loose.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fateful Connection
programme.desc: A report on the investigation led by a determined detective to solve a 30-year-old cold case involving two young women who went missing in Florida, in 1982.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Perfect Family
programme.desc: A young man is on trial for the murder of his mother.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Black Dahlia Confidential
programme.desc: The brutal murder in 1947 of Elizabeth Short, a young, struggling actress whose body was discovered in a vacant lot in January 1947, has baffled the Los Angeles Police Department for decades

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Trek
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force matches wits with a hijacker and a disloyal prison commandant.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bank
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force is dispatched to Berlin's East Zone.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Operation Heart
programme.desc: The IMF races against time to convince the president (Pernell Roberts) of a small country that his chief of secret police plans to overthrow the government and seize power.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Slave pt. 1
programme.desc: The IMF is called upon to end an inhuman situation which the United Nations has been unable to abolish: slave trade in the country of Elkabar, ruled by King Ibn Borca.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Slave pt. 2
programme.desc: The IMF continues to battle slave-trading in a Middle Eastern country by eliminating De Groot, one of the principal suppliers of victims for King Borca's slave market.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A-Counting We Will Go!
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Baby Bop count to ten by playing games, and visiting a Make-Believe Market.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Coming on Strong
programme.desc: Exercise is good for everybody and every body! From running to touching toes to jumping jacks to some favorite songs and games, Barney and his friends grow strong while having fun with exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Fountain of Fun
programme.desc: While Barney and the children wait for Mr. Boyd's new fountain to be delivered, they have fun playing in and exploring the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Good Egg
programme.desc: When the kids find a mysterious, colorful egg in the park, Barney takes them on a trip to Kenya to try to find out what kind of animal could have laid the egg.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ learns that having a pet is a bigger responsibility than he expected when he takes care of a friend’s dog. When Baby Bop’s favorite teddy bear is torn, she wants to take him to the vet for help.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bienvenido, Barney!
programme.desc: Baby Bop's friend Monty the butterfly passes through the park with a flock of friends on their way to Mexico. When Monty gets left behind by his insect friends and family, Barney takes everyone on a visit to Mexico.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Big Little Day
programme.desc: Barney helps Baby Bop and the children discover big and little things in the world around them. And by the end of the day, the kids have learned that big or little, they're all wonderful just the way they are!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Today is the big dance party in the park. Barney tells Baby Bop the story of “The Princess Without a Song to Sing.”

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hall of Fame Game
programme.desc: Allen heads to an auction with Elle, while Ton and Big Sis revamp the shop to help bring in more customers. Allen unearths a Ouija board and a set of antique basketballs, and goes toe-to-toe with an NBA Hall of Famer.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Without You
programme.desc: Farrah and Sophia visit Sophia's father's grave; Amber and her mother argue; Maci struggles to keep up; Catelynn and Tyler want to invite their daughter to graduation. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Taking It Up A Notch
programme.desc: Amber goes on a date; Catelynn, Tyler and their parents plan the perfect Christmas; Maci makes an announcement; Farrah tells her parents she wants to move to California.

programme.title: Teen Mom: As Long As We're Together
programme.desc: Farrah argues with her parents on a trip; Catelynn reunites with her father; Amber reaches out to Gary; Maci considers withdrawing from school.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Stay With Me
programme.desc: Amber spends the night in jail and learns a no-contact order has been put on her and Gary. Catelynn and Tyler have a falling out and Farrah and Sophia explore Florida.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Time Out
programme.desc: Maci and Ryan fight over custody; Amber and Gary struggle with a no-contact order; Catelynn finishes high school; Farrah's parents want her to leave Sophia behind.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team suspect that a woman's death might be the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Life Sentence
programme.desc: After a hail of gunfire tears through the crime lab, Mac becomes part of a vendetta.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Mac tries to find a little girl who has been missing since 2002.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Mac tries to find a little girl who has been missing since 2002.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Indelible
programme.desc: On the 10th anniversary of 9/11, Mac and the team remember specific moments from that day.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Clue: SI
programme.desc: When a psychiatrist’s patients are being systematically murdered, the CSIs are forced to play along in a game of Clue in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: All Fall Down
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose, leaving his mark on the chests of his victims.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a bottle girl is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must look at Miami's elite.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a reality TV star dies at a premiere, each of her co-stars becomes a suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team recreate a crime scene that has been washed away.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A roller derby arena provides the backdrop for a grisly crime.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Sudden Death
programme.desc: When a bottle girl is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through Miami's most elite guest list to find her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Run for your Life
programme.desc: A slain body of a marathon runner is found just hours before a big race. With the help of a trusted K-9 officer, Kenda sets off to find the killer himself before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Mr. Violence
programme.desc: 29yr old Chris is shot in cold blood outside a neighborhood bar. Faced with a trio of suspects, Kenda trusts his gut and makes a controversial decision.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Victim Zero
programme.desc: A brawl erupts at a local bar ends with the shooting death of a army solider. To unravel the murder, Lt. Joe Kenda most infiltrate a revered military institution, and expose a dangerous vendetta.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When police find 24-year-old Patrick Ray with a gunshot to the temple, the scene has all the telltale signs of suicide. But Lt. Joe Kenda's instinct says otherwise.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Pop Goes the Witness

programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight who has delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the Lemmings who have chosen this day to blast music.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a full crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on some white beans which have very strange properties, when mixed with soda anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. Grizzy realises that if he wants to take a nap, he must get rid of the magic beans.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Today’s the day that the machines get to build their brand new shelter. It’s going to be built into the side of a hill and made using found materials. Lofty, who slept outside at the old yard, decides that he’d like a place in the new shelter.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house, and sends the floorboards and roof tiles for recycling. As he finishes the job, he gets a call from Mr Bentley who wants him to renovate the museum’s annexe, where Mr Ellis plans to exhibit the work of local artists.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang have been asked to replace some burst pipes under the main road. Meanwhile Jenny is in town to persuade Wendy to take a much-needed holiday. Unfortunately, there’s lots of work to do and Wendy simply doesn’t have time to go away.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are finishing refurbishing the old watermill ready to begin milling the first Sunflower Valley flour. Work is just about to start when Dizzy hears a squeaking noise coming from above. There are bats in the old mill!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has a day off and he takes a trip to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs for the town photography competition. Wendy, meanwhile, has been called to the school hall where a pipe has burst, threatening the competition.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Jeremy Bamber

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sins of the Father

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Limbo
programme.desc: The Taelons lend some of their dwindling core energy to Joshua Doors for a pilot cold fusion project, but the energy is stolen, leaving the Taelons vulnerable. Jonathan Doors lives on as an AI in cyberspace.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Motherlode
programme.desc: Augur is caught and placed in a special prison where he is placed in a sensory deprivation chamber. An amoralist gets him out and wants Augur to help him steal the gold Zo'or has on the mothership. When Liam learns of what happened he tries to find Augur.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Take No Prisoners

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Second Wave

programme.title: The Lost World: Voodoo Queen

programme.title: The Lost World: Under Pressure

programme.title: The Lost World: The Outlaw

programme.title: The Lost World: Quality of Mercy
programme.desc: Veronica and Malone are imprisoned at a labor camp occupied by emotionless prisoners, robotic wardens, and alien rulers called Prin. The explorers must plan a prison break to free their cohorts.

programme.title: The Lost World: Mark of the Beast

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Leanne & Jamie
programme.desc: Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. After cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Cole, Abbie & The Fanpage
programme.desc: Cole and Abbie keep being sent anonymous creepy gifts to their home and their relationship is now at breaking point. Julie and Oobah head to Scotland to try and help save their marriage. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killer Next Door
programme.desc: Donald Miller, was sentenced to 30 to 50 years for rape and attempted murder but was suspected in four other murders. In an unusual plea bargain, Miller agreed to work with police trying to recover his memories of other murders.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours: Decades of Deceit
programme.desc: An Internet-savvy investigator works to solve a decades-old murder case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.
